title: 4 Shuunen Monst? Shiru ka yo!
original_name: 4 周年 モンスト？知るかよ！
sinopse: A 4th Anniversary Monster Strike TV commercial featuring Egashira 2:50 (pronounced Egashira Nijigojuppun), a Japanese comedian. The first commercial in the promotion was originally released with the live actor. It was then fully rotoscoped and released again with some changes as an animated version.
